# The `AMDGPUTargetMachine.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file contains both <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu">AMDGPU</a> target machine and the CodeGen pass builder. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file contains both <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu">AMDGPU</a> target machine and the CodeGen pass builder.

The <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu">AMDGPU</a> target machine contains all of the hardware specific information needed to emit code for SI+ GPUs in the legacy pass manager pipeline. The CodeGen pass builder handles the pass pipeline for new pass manager.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l01670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1670"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1671"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Here we add a stand-alone hazard recognizer pass which can handle all</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1985"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// EarlyCSE is not always strong enough to clean up what LSR produces. For</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1986"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// example, GVN can combine</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1987"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1988"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %0 = add %a, %b</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1989"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %1 = add %b, %a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1990"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1991"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1992"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1993"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %0 = shl nsw %a, 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1994"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %1 = shl %a, 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1995"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1996"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but EarlyCSE can do neither of them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1997"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpucodegenpassbuilder/#aee664c21a9659d262c33bc98eeeba042">isPassEnabled</a>(<a href="#abf6ff331b4916398a8ca064fb26dd7dd">EnableScalarIRPasses</a>))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2008"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This lowering has been placed after codegenprepare to take advantage of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2009"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// address mode matching (which is why it isn&#39;t put with the LDS lowerings).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2010"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It could be placed anywhere before uniformity annotations (an analysis</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2011"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that it changes by splitting up fat pointers into their components)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2012"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but has been put before switch lowering and CFG flattening so that those</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2013"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// passes can run on the more optimized control flow this pass creates in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2014"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// many cases.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2015"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2016"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: This should ideally be put after the LoadStoreVectorizer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2017"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// However, due to some annoying facts about ResourceUsageAnalysis,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2018"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (especially as exercised in the resource-usage-dead-function test),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2019"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we need all the function passes codegenprepare all the way through</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2020"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// said resource usage analysis to run on the call graph produced</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2021"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// before codegenprepare runs (because codegenprepare will knock some</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2022"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// nodes out of the graph, which leads to function-level passes not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2023"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// being run on them, which causes crashes in the resource usage analysis).</span></CodeLine>
